metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7725 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in ZZIPlib 0.13.68. An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in zzip_disk_fread in mmapped.c. The vulnerability causes an application crash, which leads to denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7725` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.2
zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zziplib package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.2').
